allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix slow loading and timeout issues

Changes:
- Updated financial news API to use Forex Factory calendar data
  - No longer relies on flaky web scraping or Twitter API
  - Includes CB speeches, rate decisions, and high-impact events
  - Filters for events from today to next 7 days
  - Shows forecast and previous values

- Simplified /api/events endpoint
  - Removed complex timeout logic that was causing issues
  - Uses gatherEvents() caching directly

- Fixed news source display
  - Now shows "ForexFactory" as the data source
  - Properly categorizes CB speeches and rate decisions

This fixes the "News source temporarily unavailable" error and
improves reliability of the Critical Market News section.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Filter news feed to show only critical items

Updated FinancialNewsFeed components to display only critical
(red-flagged) news from FinancialJuice, filtering out regular news.
This ensures users see only the most important market-moving events.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Enhance AI analysis with three primary objectives and unlimited depth

- Add three mandatory objectives: hawkish/dovish assessment, next CB move impact, smart money flow alignment
- Remove all token limits for ultra-detailed hyper-intelligent analysis
- Lower temperature to 0.2 for maximum analytical precision
- Update system prompt to emphasize aligning with smart money \(not outsmarting\)
- Restructure output to explicitly address all three objectives in reasoning and keyFactors
- Remove 5-factor limit to allow unlimited comprehensive analysis
- Increase timeout to 30 seconds for thorough processing
- Enhance prompts with multi-dimensional macro context framework

Key philosophy: Follow the smart money flow, don''t fight it.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Enhance CB speech AI analysis with three primary objectives matching critical news

- Add three mandatory objectives: hawkish/dovish assessment, next CB move impact, smart money flow alignment
- Remove max_tokens limit for ultra-detailed hyper-intelligent analysis
- Lower temperature to 0.2 for maximum analytical precision
- Update system prompt to emphasize aligning with smart money \(not outsmarting\)
- Restructure markdown output to explicitly address all three objectives
- Add market context and expectations to user prompt
- Enhance analysis framework with macro context integration
- Match critical market news analyzer capabilities for consistency

Now CB speech analysis provides same depth as critical news analysis.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix AI analysis error by loading dotenv configuration

- Add require\(''dotenv''\).config\(\) at the top of index.js
- This loads DEEPSEEK_API_KEY from .env file
- Fixes "API error occurred" when clicking Analyze button
- Critical fix for both market news and CB speech analysis

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Convert Schedule section to weekly calendar view and fix Scratchpad overlap

- Add WeekCalendar component with 7-day grid layout
- Display events in proper calendar format with navigation controls
- Fix QuickNotes component overlap by removing duplicate container styling
- Update Schedule section to render React calendar component
- Add server route and file watcher for week-calendar.jsx

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
